Token.Abstract: Employs a snap to move the pane between states.
The child behavior that is used to position the pane.
The child behavior that is used to position the pane.
The child behavior that is used to position the pane.
Initializes a pane positioning behavior with a drawer view controller.

Parameter.Name: drawerViewController
Parameter.Abstract: The drawer view controller whose pane you want to be subject to the positioning behavior.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The initialized pane positioning behavior, or nil if there was a problem initializing the object.

Token.Abstract: Positions the pane dynamic item in the desired direction with the specified state. This method is only invoked internally by the associated MSDynamicsDrawerViewController. It should not be invoked otherwise. When subclassing MSPanePositioningBehavior, this method should be overridden to adjust child behaviors to create the desired effect.

Parameter.Name: paneState
Parameter.Abstract: The state that the pane should be positioned in. Represented as targetPaneState after this method is invoked and until this behavior is removed from its dynamic animator.

Parameter.Name: direction
Parameter.Abstract: The direction that the pane should be positioned in. Represented as targetDirection after this method is invoked and until this behavior is removed from its dynamic animator.
